trans-unit.source: Provides support for the behavior that enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte para o comportamento que permite [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pontos de extremidade para receber solicitações HTTP de um cliente do ASP.NET AJAX com base em navegador.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When applied to an endpoint, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplicado a um ponto de extremidade, o comportamento de WebScriptEnablingBehavior habilita [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e integração de AJAX do ASP.NET, exceto para o suporte necessário para a codificação JSON JavaScript Object Notation ().

trans-unit.source: Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> or by an appropriately configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Vários tipos de codificação, incluindo o JSON, estão habilitados pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>ou por um <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> adequadamente configurado</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: The WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> and inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o comportamento de WebScriptEnablingBehavior a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>e herda do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, que permite que o modelo de programação da Web mais geral para [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviços expor pontos de extremidade SOAP não.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior: - Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o WebScriptEnablingBehavior:-permite que o modelo de programação HTTP, incluindo o envio para operações com base em um sufixo de URL, o suporte para seleção de verbo HTTP (POST ou GET) e controle de duração do cache HTTP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]a programação HTTP do modelo, consulte [WCF Web HTTP de programação visão geral do modelo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o verbo HTTP padrão é POST ao usar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: -Permite que o formatador correto para solicitação e resposta mensagens de cada operação - por exemplo, o suporte para parâmetros de URL.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -Permite que o ponto de extremidade de JavaScript Proxy.

trans-unit.source: To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding and the WebScriptEnablingBehavior must be added to the endpoint behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: Para chamar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço de um cliente do ASP.NET AJAX, o serviço deve ser configurado com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>de associação e o WebScriptEnablingBehavior devem ser adicionado à coleção de comportamento de ponto de extremidade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either in configuration by adding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) directive in the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser feito na configuração adicionando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>ou sem usar a configuração ativando o ponto de extremidade AJAX com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>em vez de fábrica padrão no [ @ServiceHost ](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) diretiva no arquivo. svc.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]diferentes maneiras de habilitar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço para responder aos clientes do ASP.NET AJAX, consulte [criando serviços WCF para o ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A>para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Aplica o comportamento para o cliente em um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>método para exibir, modificar ou Adicionar extensão personalizada para o tempo de execução do cliente em todas as mensagens usadas com um ponto de extremidade ou para operações específicas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>aos quais o comportamento personalizado que é aplicado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Aplica o comportamento de ponto de extremidade de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é chamado pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automaticamente quando o comportamento é aplicado a um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: So there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário para chamar esse método manualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>aos quais o comportamento personalizado que é aplicado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se a seleção automática de formato está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]seleção automática de formato, consulte [formatação do WCF Web HTTP](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a seleção automática de formato estiver habilitada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de corpo de mensagem padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value is the only <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> supported and setting any other value results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor é o único <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>com suporte e configuração qualquer outro valor resulta em um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>que está sendo gerada.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: This default value is the only valid value.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o único valor válido.

trans-unit.source: The body style set is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para o conjunto de estilo de corpo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing request message format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato de mensagem de solicitação saída padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing request messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> usado por mensagens de solicitação de saída.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de formato de mensagem não é um valor válido de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response message format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o formato de mensagem de resposta saída padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing response messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> usado por mensagens de resposta de saída.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de formato de mensagem não é um valor válido de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o sinalizador que especifica se uma FaultException é gerada quando um erro de servidor interno (código de status HTTP: 500) ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o sinalizador estiver habilitado; caso contrário, retornará <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de Ajuda do REST está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de Ajuda do REST, consulte [página de ajuda de serviço do WCF Web HTTP](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de Ajuda do REST estiver habilitada; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Confirma que o ponto de extremidade atende aos requisitos que permitem que ele funcione como um ponto de extremidade do ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, and that the binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o ponto de extremidade não é `null`, usa o esquema HTTP ou HTTPS, não use o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, usa o verbo de HTTP GET ou POST, que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>da associação é definido como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, e que a ligação contém um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>onde <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.
trans-unit.target: Esse método também verifica que não existem cabeçalhos SOAP ou nomes de wrapper em métodos ou outros aspectos sem suporte das operações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade não atende a um dos requisitos para ser um ponto de extremidade do ASP.NET AJAX.
